body: The frame where she's looking in the mirror is sooooo good

Not going to lie, this is one of the best corruption stories I've ever read. Despite being a rotten jerkwad, he at least has morals in his idea of corruption; while he did certainly say that he'll pass her up to his superiors, to me, it sounded more like an empty threat because the last page implies that he has never shared her with any other man and I respect that. I also respect that he made sure to do all the work himself, building the machine needed to corrupt her and modifying himself to bed the girl. In any case, 10/10. I'd certainly be happier if there was a sequel with impregnation and pregnant play but I can only hope.
Shouldn't this have a rape tag?
Hey, breast expansion tag that isn't disgusting.
@AlgebraS Authors who make these are just nihilistic.

What turns me down the most about this kind of story is, it oftenly ends at "I'll bring my friends here to teach them this pleasure" or other around that line and that's the end of it, no sequel or anything. Sure some actually continued but it's too scarce
Nice art, average story, fappable sex scenes. Would come again.
